en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors 3rd Hua Hin Cha-Am Golf Competition, Thailand!
en.content:
The 3rd Golf Competition of the Hua Hin Cha-Am Golf Festival 2008 was conducted at championship golf course - Majestic Creek. The Competition was fully booked by Thai and foreign golfers, especially from Japan, Korea and Taiwan. Majestic Creek  golf course is well known to be a tough course to play due to it's narrow fairways and fast green.

Winners of the competition were talented Thai golfers. FusionExcel is a Sponsor of the Event and FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant  was the only product allowed to do sales and conduct demonstrations on the stage during the Award Presentation.

Thank you FusionExcel Leader, Vivat and team for yet another successful event!
 

Golfers waiting for putting practice
FusionExcel Leader Vivat explains to  young golfer how Quantum Pendant can help improve flexibility
FusionExcel Leader Vivat explains how Quantum Pendant can improve strength
Vivat doing balance test with Quantum Pendant
Vivat explaining the balance test
14 year old Quantum Pendant Wearer of 2 mths. Handicap improves to 4!
Winner of Competition receiving Quantum Pendant from Vivat
Vivat with Winners of Golf Competition
